text:
Just found another reason to get rid of the above form ugly UI

If the form has any rich text added to it, making a change via this editor deletes it from the form, and with no way to revert forms, you get in a bit of a pickle with trying to remember what explainer text you’d added to the form
Yeah, honestly i can’t confidently sell a HubSpot membership website.

Template-specific modules are a must IMO. Also an ability to limit particular modules with certain tags on a template.
```<!--
  templateType: page
  isAvailableForNewContent: true
  permittedModuleTags: row_modules, some_other_module_tag
  label: My flexible column only template
-->```
Moreover — I was on with HS support asking if they knew of any workarounds that I didnt — and they told me that I should just buy CMS Enterprise to test the features…
How have yall build section navigation? Looking for ideas on making it happen.
I usually do a custom module within a global partial these days
